Question: Mad Catz Global Limited CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Mad Catz Global Limited

Product Highlight: CES 2024

- Mad Catz announces the release of new products in familiar categories and several new models in existing product lines at CES 2024
- One of its most iconic and award-winning products will be resurrected, redesigned, and upgraded to modern standards
- The company is a leading innovator in gaming hardware, designing products for gaming across multiple platforms including PCs, consoles, handheld consoles, smartphones, tablets, and other mobile devices
- Mad Catz promotes its brand across five continents and distributes its products around the globe
- Social media platforms include Facebook, Instagram, X, and LinkedIn
- For additional information, interested parties can reach out to Mad Catz at the provided contacts
